30.heading: APA-I.
30.title: Export Newspaper Service Contents List : an Index Prepared for the 100th Mailing of APA-I
30.author: by Randall W

publication info.publisher: Special Collections Division, Michigan State University Libraries

notes: Summary: Export Newspaper Service was a New York publisher that packaged Spanish-language comic books, translated from English, for distribution in Latin America from about 1952 to 1959. This document lists the stories in each of 630 issues of 36 serial titles, accounting for most of this publisher's output.

APA-I is the Amateur Press Alliance for Indexing. Early mailings have been separated into individual titles and cataloged separately for the most part (please scroll down), while later mailings will be itemized following the example of no. 104 just below. See also
  • Discrete Little Items
  • Index Finger
  • Return from Reality
